body:
Hi Silvia,


You should definitely update to the latest version of OpenStudio (0.8.3), which fixed a couple of Windows-related issues. Version 0.8.4 is due out any day now, which has even more improvements, but 0.8.3 should be useable for you today. 


- Rob
